text: A Cruel Romance () is a 1984 Russian romantic drama movie directed by Eldar Ryazanov and is the second adaption of the 1878 play Without a Dowry by Alexander Ostrovsky. It stars Andrey Myagkov, Larisa Guzeyeva, Nikita Mikhalkov, Alisa Freindlich and distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 romantic drama movies Category:Russian romance movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Eldar Ryazanov
title: A Cruel Romance
